Name: ABSORB
Explain:
An attack that
absorbs half the
damage it inflicted
to restore HP.

Name: BUBBLE
Explain:
A spray of bubbles
hits the foe. It
may lower the
foe¡¯s SPEED stat.

Name: EMBER
Explain: The foe is attacked with small flames. The foe may suffer a burn.

Name: GROWL
Explain:
The user growls in
a cute way, making
the foe lower its
ATTACK stat.

Name: GUST
Explain: Strikes the foe with a gust of wind whipped up by wings.

Name: LEECH SEED
Explain: A seed is planted on the foe to steal some HP for the user on every turn.

Name: QUICK ATTACK
Explain: An almost invisibly fast attack that is certain to strike first.

Name: SAND ATTACK
Explain: A lot of sand is hurled in the foe¡¯s face, reducing its accuracy.

Name: SCRATCH
Explain: Hard, pointed, and\nsharp claws rake\nthe foe.

Name: TACKLE
Explain:
A physical attack
in which the user
charges, full body,
into the foe.

Name: TAIL WHIP
Explain:
The user wags its
tail cutely, making
the foe lower its
DEFENSE stat.
